text: Silent Hill is a survival horror video game franchise created by Team Silent and published by Konami and Konami Digital Entertainment. As well as the main video game series, numerous types of accompanying merchandise have been released. ==Video games== ===Main series=== P.T. was released only for a demo on the PS4, the title was to be Silent Hills but it got cancelled before its release. ===Spin-offs and compilations=== ==Films== ==Other media== ===Soundtracks=== {| class="wikitable sortable plainrowheaders" style="width: 100%;" |- !width="50%" scope="col"|Title !width="15%" scope="col"|Release date !width="13%" scope="col" data-sort-type="number"|Length !width="30%" scope="col"|Label !width="2%" scope="col" class="unsortable"|Ref. |- style="text-align: center;" !scope="row" align="center"| SILENT HILL ORIGINAL SOUNDTRACKS | | |King Records | |- style="text-align: center;" !scope="row" align="center"| SILENT HILL 2 ORIGINAL SOUNDTRACKS | | | Konami Music Entertainment | |- style="text-align: center;" !scope="row" align="center"| SILENT HILL 3 original soundtracs | | | Konami Music Entertainment | |- style="text-align: center;" !scope="row" align="center"| SILENT HILL 4 –THE ROOM– ORIGINAL SOUNDTRACKS | | | Konami Media Entertainment | |- style="text- align: center;" !scope="row" align="center"| SILENT HILL ZERO ORIGINAL SOUNDTRACKS | | | Konami Digital Entertainment | |- style="text-align: center;" !scope="row" align="center"| Silent Hill Downpour Original Soundtrack | | | Milan Records | |- style="text-align: center;" !scope="row" align="center"| Silent Hill: Homecoming Original Soundtrack | | | Milan Records | |- style="text-align: center;" !scope="row" align="center"| Silent Hill Shattered Memories Original Soundtrack | | | Milan Records | |- style="text-align: center;" !scope="row" align="center"| Silent Hill Book of Memories Original Soundtrack | | | Milan Records | |} == References == Media Silent Hill Silent Hill
